channel.title: Pushing ConstantClass in BCEL?
channel.description: How do you push a ConstantClass in BCEL? I've tried InstructionFactory.createConstant(Class.class), but it's telling me that that's for primitive types and Strings. Help appreciated :).

item.title: Pushing ConstantClass in BCEL?
item.dc:creator: @White_Castle White Castle
item.description:
@White_Castle wrote:

I’ve given up long since, because doing either of the couple of solutions was giving me constantpool type errors. Thanks anyways :).

Read full topic

item.title: Pushing ConstantClass in BCEL?
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

I don’t recall ever doing that, but I imagine you could just create a ConstantClass object directly.

ConstantClass(int name_index)

You just need to have the (fully qualified) name in the constant pool somewhere.

Read full topic
